text: Lantern tree is a common name for several plants and may refer to: *Crinodendron hookerianum, or Chilean lantern tree *Dichrostachys cinerea, or Chinese lantern tree, native to Africa and widely introduced *Hernandia nymphaeifolia, or Chinese lantern tree, native to coastal areas throughout the tropics *Nymania capensis, or Chinese lantern tree, native to southern Africa
title: Lantern tree
